Actions.Name: Slaver
Actions.Effects: The Nilfling can dash 2 before this attack.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe takes [fray] damage and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Leap
Actions.Description: The Nilfling flies 2. When it lands, all adjacent characters are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Finish Off
Actions.Description: The Nilfling deals a phenomenal blow to an adjacent bloodied character. That character must save or take 2[D]+[fray], become dazed, and become winded. On a successful save, they only take [D]+[fray] and are either dazed or winded (the Nilfling can choose).
